cheat.description: Hover tanks never decrease in battle
Ballistic Missiles never decrease in battle
Homing Missiles never decrease in battle
Constantly get 9999999 cash on all planets with 1% or higher tax
View a planet's stats for high food (1 of 2)
View a planet's stats for high food (2 of 2)
View a planet's stats for high people (1 of 2)
View a planet's stats for high people (2 of 2)
View a planet's stats for high energy (1 of 2)
View a planet's stats for high energy (2 of 2)
View a planet's stats for high fuel (1 of 2)
